title: Senate to return to Washington as Congress struggles to reconcile constitutional duties with risk of pandemic
description: Capitol Hill’s split screen reflects the unique responsibilities of each chamber, the political imperatives of the opposing parties that control them and the differing personalities of their respective leaders.
